original_title: Opposition MPs to discuss No-Confidence Motion against Health Minister
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Members of the opposition are set to convene a discussion this week to deliberate on the necessary actions concerning the motion of no confidence against Minister of Health, Keheliya Rambukwella.
The National organiser of the Samagi Janabalawegaya Tissa Attanayake, says that they plan to request the Speaker of Parliament to expedite a parliamentary debate in this regard as well.
